lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00] 作词 : Scott, Young, Young
[00:16.170]Livin' easy, lovin' free, season ticket, on a one - way ride
[00:26.620]Askin' nothin', leave me be, takin' everything in my stride
[00:35.580]Don't need reason, don't need rhyme
[00:39.400]Ain't nothing I'd rather do
[00:43.260]Goin' down, party time, My friends are gonna be there too
[00:52.690]I'm on the highway to hell
[01:01.470]Highway to hell
[01:04.910]I'm on the highway to hell
[01:12.560]No stop signs, speed limit, nobody's gonna slow me down
[01:20.650]Like a wheel, gonna spin it. nobody's gonna mess me around
[01:28.950]Hey Satan, payin' my dues, playin' in a rockin' band
[01:37.180]Hey Mama, look at me, I'm on my way to the promised land
[01:45.640]I'm on the highway to hell
[01:50.140]Highway to hell
[01:54.789]I'm on the highway to hell
[02:06.260]Dont stop me!
[02:28.210]I'm on the highway to hell
[02:32.340]On the highway to hell!
[02:36.630]Highway to hell!
[02:40.370]I'm on the highway to hell
[03:01.900]And I'm going down.all the way
[03:22.670]I'm on the highway to hell

tlyric.lyric:
[00:16.170]从容安乐地生活 无拘无束地爱 月票一去不复返
[00:26.620]你勿问 你滚开 我边大步流星地走 边随手带走每一片云彩
[00:35.580]无需理由 无需押韵
[00:39.400]无事我愿
[00:43.260]不断前行 此刻是派对狂欢时间我友也将准时到点
[00:52.690]飞驰于地狱之路
[01:01.470]地狱大道
[01:04.910]飞驰于地狱之路
[01:12.560]没有法规 没有限速 无人可阻挡我
[01:20.650]似一轮胎 无止转动 无人可混淆我
[01:28.950]你好撒旦 付我欠款 处于摇滚乐团
[01:37.180]你好妈妈 仔细看我 我正在去应许之地
[01:45.640]飞驰于地狱之路
[01:50.140]地狱大道
[01:54.789]义无反顾踏上地狱大道
[02:06.260]无人可阻挡
[02:28.210]飞驰于地狱之路
[02:32.340]飞驰于地狱之路
[02:36.630]地狱之路
[02:40.370]飞驰于地狱之路
[03:01.900]吾心堕落
[03:22.670]飞驰于地狱之路
